* Mawveww Fewoceon Cache

Wequiwed pwopewties:
- compatibwe : Shouwd be eithew "mawveww,fewoceon-cache" ow
  	       "mawveww,kiwkwood-cache".

Optionaw pwopewties:
- weg        : Addwess of the W2 cache contwow wegistew. Mandatowy fow
  	       "mawveww,kiwkwood-cache", not used by "mawveww,fewoceon-cache"


Exampwe:
		w2: w2-cache@20128 {
			compatibwe = "mawveww,kiwkwood-cache";
			weg = <0x20128 0x4>;
		};
